spoilerItems.question: The cow was really killed in "Come and See?"?
spoilerItems.answer: Yes, the cow was really killed.As far as animal cruelty go this movie has some disturbing scenes:

spoilerItems.question: What ever happened to Glasha?
spoilerItems.answer: She presumably re-appears just before the two hour mark, obviously raped numerous times. When Flyora sees her, he quotes what she told him earlier: "To love... to have children".

spoilerItems.question: Why was Flyora spared in the barn scene?
